sentences.english: This marked the beginning of the 131st commencement.
sentences.chinese: 校歌響起，標誌着第131屆畢業典禮正式開始。

sentences.english: Rise the national flag. Sing the national song!
They locked arms and sang the old school song.
sentences.chinese: 他們挽起手臂，唱起了那首古老的校歌。

sentences.english: The students locked arms and sang the school song.
sentences.chinese: 學生們挽着手臂，唱起校歌。

sentences.english: Heimprovised a new stanza form the school song at the football game.
sentences.chinese: 他在足球賽中爲校歌即興創作歌詞。

sentences.english: Everybody finished the song at different times.
sentences.chinese: 大家七零八落地唱完了這首校歌。

sentences.english: When the game is half over , the band comes onto the field and plays school songs.
sentences.chinese: 當比賽中場時，樂隊上場並演奏校歌。

sentences.english: We'll sing our school song leaving out the last ten verses.
sentences.chinese: 我們唱校歌要省略最後十節。

sentences.english: They locked arms and sang the old school song .
sentences.chinese: 他們挽起手臂，唱起了那首古老的校歌。

definition: March of the Volunteer Army (PRC National Anthem)
pinyin: Yi4 yong3 jun1 Jin4 xing2 qu3

definition: anniversary of the founding of a school
to sing opera music (without staging or make up)
Yellow River Cantata (1939) by Xian Xinghai 冼星海[Xian3 Xing1 hai3]
